name: Chains (itch) (Iris8_7)
description:
You are a volunteer militar to taking care of a monster in the dungeons. That monster appeared a few days ago, but hopefully the military was able to catch it.

You'll have to make sure that its chains are well connected, so he can't scape.

Be quick! While you're making sure the chains are on, it is trying to escape. If the time runs out, it will scape and hit you!
